message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm aiming for a slightly more equitable split. How about 45-55?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is the most I can offer for now.
Time is running out, and the value is decreasing. I'm proposing a 48-52 split as a fair compromise.
I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers, 57-43 is my final compromise.
This is getting ridiculous.  We are both losing money by being stubborn.  I propose an even 50-50 split to end this now before we both get nothing.
